Daniel was looking at her with a strong concentrated gaze and she felt herself feeling awkward all of a sudden, like she'd done something wrong. "I've never seen an exchange student so small before." It was Elizas turn to speak, suddenly Sandra was picked up by the armpits and held out to Eliza. "You can hold her if you want to." Sandra dangled there unable to get away. Eliza shook her head. "No its quite alright I'll just end up dropping her or something, she looks pretty fragile. Sandra heard Anya laugh and Sandra tried to twist round to see her carer but she was being held pretty firmly so was unable to move much. She heard Anya speak though "no, not at all, children this young are actually quite robust. Look she wont bite, well...I don't think she'll bite" Daniel chuckled, "what she means El, is that if you drop her, she'll bounce" he chuckled some more as Sandra was handed over to Eliza who looked a little distressed at suddenly having to hold this squirming baby.
155111111111.title: chapter 3

1551111111111.content: "Look hold her like this." Anya moved round and helped Eliza hold Sandra so that Eliza found herself cradling Sandra carefully. Sandra in her position could only look up at this new woman. Eliza looked down at sandra with a mix of confusion, interest and horror on her face. "well...err...yeah this is great, although I thought exchange students were a lot less wet than this." Sandra's face burned with embarrassment and she suddenly burst into tears, her dummy falling out of her mouth and dropping to the blanket. "Awww sweetie sweetie sweetie, don't cry, shhhhh shhhhh" Anya had plucked Sandra back from Eliza and was gently rocking her. picking up the dummy and trying to pop it back in Sandra's mouth but sandra wasn't noticing, she was too busy crying. "My goodness you HAVE soaked yourself haven't you, what a soggy little baby" Anya smiled serenely but Sandra continued to cry, never having felt so humiliated in all her life. "It's okay little one, don't worry, lets get you cleaned up huh" Sandra felt relief, they could go back to their quarters and she would be able to talk to Anya again, and get out of this sodden mess. She still cried but was less intense. "You guys don't mind if I change her here do you?" Sandra's eyes widened in horror, here? in front of these people? Out in the open like this? No no NO! Anya was already digging around in the white bag she had brought with them, Sandra had to get away, She flopped herself onto the blanket and started to move in the only way she possibly could, she crawled. She could hear Anya chuckling and Sandra hadn't even reached the end of the blanket before she felt both her little bootied feet grabbed and she was slowly and gently hauled back to Anyas lap and flipped over onto her back so that she was looking up at Anya. "My my little one, where ever are you going? Are you exploring? Are you?" Anya smiled and tickled Sandras tummy, a small giggle escaped sandra even though she hadn't wanted to laugh. "Please don't change me here, please. lets go back. I want to go back" Sandra sobbed as Anya continued to chuckle and unpop the side poppers of Sandra's nappy cover. Whipping it off quickly Anya then unpinned the wet nappy and put it into a plastic bag. "my you're a little chatterbox today aren't you, I can't wait till you start speaking real words, you're going to be so much fun. " Anya turned her attention to her two friends as she got out some wipes gathered Sandra's squirming feet up in one large hand and lifted her so that she could be cleaned up. "So hows work?" Eliza shrugged, as she watched Anya clean up her baby "Same old job really, Security detail has been quiet to be honest, but its only a few days into the journey, its normally later in the trip that people start getting tetchy with one another and we start having to really work." Daniel nodded. "yep a couple of months stuck on this space boat has most people going stir crazy." Sandra was still trying to struggle away but Anya hadn't really noticed as she dusted her baby with talc and slid a disposable Diaper under her naked bottom. Sandra just cried, if she'd thought this was going to happen she would have been more adamant about staying in their quarters. Eliza spoke over Sandra's wailing. "How's it going with you Anya? I mean having that to look after as well as your job, isn't that going to get hectic?" Anya nodded, "yes it will get fairly tricky later looking after Sandy, but for the first three weeks I have a settling in period, so i'm not actually at work at the moment." Both Eliza and Daniel made a collective "ahhh" noise, as if some question that had been perplexing them had finally been answered. "Yep, its just me and her, for the time being. I feel really blessed. She's such a bright...." Anya paused as she pulled the attachment tapes of the disposable and fixed them in place...."little girl." With the nappy now firmly fixed on, Anya picked up Sandra and hugged her a little bit trying to calm the still crying baby. "its okay now, clean and dry see, that wasn't so bad was it." Anya jiggled Sandra up and down gently trying to sooth her, rubbing the baby's forehead rhythmically trying to comfort Sandra . Sandra was exhausted and distressed by the whole affair and felt her loud wailing slowly subsiding into a whimper and then the occasional sniffle. carefully Sandra placed the pacifier back into Sandra's mouth and this time Sandra accepted it. Anya grinned broadly down at her baby. "there we go, shhhhhhh, Shhhhhhh, I made it ALLLL better." Sandra sniffled some more, her heart still pounding heavily in her chest. If the guys back at the office could only see her now, her face flushed crimson again at the mere thought of her boss seeing her in this state, the rhythmic motion of the rocking was beginning to make Sandra tired, Anya had resumed talking to her two friends "why are you crying?" Sandra heard the voice clear as day. it was a little boys voice, probably five years old at best. She was suddenly wide awake again, and looked around for the boy. She couldn't see him. Anya watched Sandra perk up a bit, she felt frustrated that she couldn't understand her baby, maybe bringing her out this soon had been a bad idea. She placed Sandra down on the blanket, now that her baby had stopped crying. Perhaps they should go back so that sandra could rest. Sandra looked around feeling confused, the voice had been very close, she looked at Anya and Anya smiled at her. "Did you hear that kid?" Anya ruffled Sandra's hair. "There's a good little girl" Sandra looked around. "Are you a good little girl?" the boys voice asked again. Sandra couldn't figure out from what direction the boy was coming from so she just nodded. Sandra noticed something moving in one of the trees nearest to her. Whatever it was it was black, and fairly big. Sandra pointed up, alarmed by whatever was up there, it didn't look human...or alien...or whatever she was now. Anya looked up to where Sandra was pointing. "Did you spot a birdie, did you? did you?" Suddenly Anya grabbed Sandra and started tickling her feet, Sandra burst into hysterical infectious laughter and both Eliza and Daniel chuckled too. Sandra could hear the kid giggling too. "That looks like fun." The voice was louder now and Anya gasped and stopped tickling. "look sweetie there's a birdie" The black thing in the trees had come down from the branches, but it wasn't like any bird Sandra had ever seen, if anything it was more like a dog. It looked surprisingly like a black Labrador puppy except instead of a muzzle it had a beak, it didn't have feathers on its body but its black fur looked very floaty and fluffy, and it had two large feathered wings protruding from its back. Sandra's eyes widened in surprise. the dog bird things beak opened and a green tongue flopped out as it panted. It cocked its head to one side and took a few more cautious steps towards the people on the blanket. "you're very small" The boys voice said, and suddenly Sandra realised that it was the bird dog thing that was speaking to her. She looked at Anya, and Eliza and Daniel, none of them seemed to be showing any indication that they could hear this creature, was it all in her head. She felt stupid but shyly opened her mouth. "are...are..you talking to me?" The dog bird made a yipping squawking noise and bounded around the blanket happily. Anya looked surprised "yes, yes I am. What's your name?"
1551111111111.title: part 2

15511111111111.content: Daniel was speaking to Anya. "I've never seen one this friendly before, looks like a chick, wonder where the mother is." Anya was looking concerned. "I don't know, but I think it's time we made a move, there's still much of the ship to see." Sandra was fixated by the dog bird. "I'm sandra, err...nice to meet you....what are you?" Suddenly Anya was standing up and picked Sandra up and plopped her back into the baby carrier. Sandra wanted to stay now, and speak to the dog bird. "wait, don't leave now. I want to stay." Sandra sounded distressed, the urgency must have transferred to her baby babble because Anya seemed to get the idea, but she simply chuckled. "Don't worry kiddo, we'll come back here a lot, wave buh bye to our friends." Anya grasped one of Sandras tiny hands and waved for her. The dog bird cocked its head to one side. "oh are you leaving? So soon? Come play sometime kay. I like you." Sandra felt sad she wasn't getting more time to get to know the creature, the only being so far to understand her outside of the apartment, it was like an oasis in the middle of a large desert. "Well have fun at work guys and I guess I'll see you around." Anya was saying. Daniel nodded as he pulled on his t-shirt. "Yeah, we'll be here most mornings around this sort of time, it's a great place for just chilling out" Anya smiled. "oh well in that case, i'll possibly pop out again tomorrow. See you here then." Eliza waved at Sandra. "bye Sandy, see you tomorrow." With that Anya turned round and walked back to the elevator. The dog bird was following them. And sandra could hear Daniel and Eliza laughing, they called out to Anya. "Looks like you have someone else to look after" Anya turned round, alarmed that it was following them. "Shoo you silly thing, go on, go find your mother" She waved her hands at the chick and because of her sudden movements the chick quickly squawked spread its wings and took off back into the dense safety of the trees. "byeeeee!" Sandra called out. "byeeeee!" the dog bird thing replied. Anya was back at the elevator, she'd pressed the button and stepped inside once it had opened. Sandra couldn't see anyas expression, which was just as well because Anya was looking throughly distressed.
15511111111111.title: part 3

155111111111111.content:
Sandra absently played with her fingers feeling a little bored as the elevator transported them away from the self contained forest. As she dangled their in the baby safety harness she felt a sense of loss leaving the dog bird thing behind. She was curious to know what it was, but would have to wait until they got back to their quarters to ask Anya. Anya had certainly left in a hurry, Sandra sucked on her pacifier thoughtfully as the lift came to a halt and Anya stepped out onto the shopping plaza. It was a very clean looking plaza with trees in large pot plants dotted around the area. All the buildings looked like white washed stone, but the shops had bright window displays. She could smell food wafting from a few of the buildings and the sound of amicable chatter and bartering filled the area, It felt light and airy despite the fact that the plaza was thronged with people. Sandra looked up towards the ceiling and was surprised to see sky. Blue with the occasional wispy cloud floating past. It couldn't be real, they were on a ship, or so she had been told. The fake sky though was very realistic...very realistic indeed. There was a large plaque in front of them which looked like a map of the area, but there was so much information on the board, pictures and symbols scrolled digitally across it, and it kept changing like someone was flicking over the TV channel every 30 seconds It was hard for Sandra to comprehend what it was she was actually looking at. It resembled modern art more than a public information board. Not being able to read or communicate was seriously getting Sandra down. She sighed a little and Anya must have felt the child's movement because she ruffled Sandra's hair. "Sandy this is where everyone comes to get things that they need or want. I want to take you some place I know my little baby will enjoy" Sandra still cringed when she was referred to as a baby, She was 28 not a two year old, or however old she was now. She'd find a way to get back to being her normal self...some how.

Anya was walking happily down the centre of the plaza. A few people stopped to wave or shout a hello from a shop doorway as she passed them, everyone seemed to friendly. Sandra smiled, she could sense that this community was a strong one. They passed what looked like a green grocers and a large busty woman popped her head round the shop doorway. "Anya! Hey come over her will ya, I wanna take a look at your new bundle of joy!" Anya changed direction and moved inside the shop. Sandra goggled at all the different things on the shelves and racks dotted around the room. Exotic fruits and vegetables the likes of which she had never seen. One shelf seemed to sport what looked like pineapples except that they were completely red in colour and the leaves every so often shook with a slight jingling noise, almost like wind chimes. Amazing. Sandras mouth had fallen open in awe and her dummy fell to the ground. She was brought out of her revere when the large woman cackled heartily. Sandra hadn't been paying the slightest bit of attention to the conversation she had been so caught up in the produce on the shelves. Alarmed suddenly at being poked in the tummy by the fat ladys index finger. "She's much smaller than I expected, still suppose that means she probably doesn't eat that much right?" Again another cackle spewed from the woman. Sandra looked up at the lady, her hair was grey and pulled back into a bun although scraggly bits of hair had now escaped, coupled with the large Owl like glasses perched on the end of the womans nose, she looked like a crazy lady. She was bordering on obese and wore a loose fitting silver and brown dress that came all the way to the floor hiding the majority of her bulk. Anya was speaking now, ".....Actually now that you mention it Moira , it is probably time for her to feed, Would it be okay if I used your room out back, I need some place quiet." Moira nodded enthusiastically, "knock yourself out darling, wouldn't want the little pipsqueak bawling all my customers away because she's hungry now would I. Here you can have this too." Moira grabbed a vegetable, or was it a fruit? from one of the shelves and passed it to Anya. It resembled a cucumber in shape but had the furry brown covering of a kiwi fruit. Anya grinned. "Hey thanks, what do I owe you for it?" "Don't be silly, its free, after all you BOTH need to keep your strength up right? Think of it as my contribution to the greater good." With that Moira shooed Anya out towards the back of the shop. Anya threw the fruit up into the air and caught it as she walked the short corridor to the room she was searching for. Pushing open the door and closing it gently behind her she turned and walked further into the room, It had a desk with a large black chair positioned behind it. In one corner it had a brown soft sofa with a reading table and lamp next to a large bookcase stuffed haphazardly full of what looked like books. Anya headed for the sofa placing the fruit on the table and pulling Sandra out of the harness as she did so. She settled down on the sofa and gently nestled Sandra in her lap. Sandra looked up at her carer as Anya undid the top button of the blouse she wore. It was pretty warm in here, Sandra guessed Anya must be too warm, but Anya continued to unbutton her blouse until her plain white bra was exposed. A maternity bra. Sandras eyes widened in horror. "No. i'm sorry but if you're planning on doing what I think you're doing you can count me right out" Sandra shook her head violently from side to side. She wasn't sucking on any nipples. Anya looked down at her baby as she unfastened the catch on her maternity bra. "Now come on sweetie, I know you must be hungry. you have to eat or you'll get ill, you want to be big enough to walk don't you? It's not like you haven't tasted it before, you drank it quick enough earlier." Sandra felt sick. She thought she had been drinking baby bottle formula earlier, it was now apparent it had been expressed breast milk. Anya lifted Sandra to her breast, the nipple a few centimetres from Sandras mouth. Sandra shook her head again determined that she wasn't going to do this, but Sandras internal baby urges overpowered her again and she quickly and successfully latched on and began to suckle. "That's a relief, you looked like you were going to be a stubborn little baby for a second there." Anya cooed as Sandra nursed. "It's really important you get nutrients from me, you may have noticed you're a little bit tired and probably light headed and that's because our air has a higher concentration of nitrogen than you're used to. Taking milk from me will help you adapt to that, it'll strengthen the bond between us too, so hopefully later outings like this one i'll be able to hook into your thoughts and be able to tell what you need. I'll be glad when I can do that. I'm sorry, you must feel so trapped right now." Sandra listened to this as she gulped down the creamy fluid, she hadn't realised how hungry she had been and despite the fact she was mortified by her situation, the closeness to Anya, the way Anya smelt had Sandra in a contented daze. She felt protected and safe. Sandra felt....loved. She stopped suckling. Loved. Yes! That's exactly how she felt and she tingled with pleasure from the realisation of it. When was the last time she had felt like this? Sandra racked her brain, and failed to come up with a comparison. She latched back on and fed until she was full, her big blue eyes gazing up into Anyas deep brown loving ones. Her eyelids became heavy as Anya extracted her nipple and attached the hook back on the maternity bra. Dabbing a bit of drooled milk from Sandra's slightly open mouth Anya smiled as she popped the dummy back in. When she spoke it was in a hushed whisper as she could tell Sandra was now fast approaching sleep. "Whose a good tiredly little girl, all filled up for mummy, " It had been a slip of the tongue and Anya felt strange for even calling herself mummy. Sandra in her dozing state mumbled some incoherent baby babble, but Anya was sure she'd heard Sandra say "Mama" in amongst the baby babble. Tears stung Anya's eyes and she blinked them back. Sandra was just a tiny image of perfection, just like her previous child had been. Lynn had been adorable and about Sandras age when the disease had claimed her. The disease wreaked havoc on the young and the old alike, the population was dwindling as more and more young children were claimed by the disease, fewer citizens reached adulthood. The problem was getting beyond all hope. But in that first year with Lynn, Anya had been adamant that Lynn would be different, Lynn would escape the disease. Lynn would be hers forever. Sadly Lynn wasn't special, Lynn wasn't spared and from the day of her daughters death Anya vowed to do everything in her power to help fix the problem. Who'd have guessed six years later she'd be the one raising potentially her race's last hope. She looked down at the sleeping Sandra, gently she stroked some of Sandras mousey blond hair out of her eyes, and whispered. "you really have no idea just how incredibly important you are."
155111111111111.title: chapter 4

1551111111111111.content: An hour passed in that room. That room where only She and Sandra existed. Anya felt incredibly content and at peace within herself as she watched her child sleep. At some point during the hour Sandra had messed herself but Anya had changed her nappy and Sandra had not even woke up during the change. She'd brought a second outfit in the changing bag with her so had taken the opportunity to put her baby in the new outfit. A light yellow denim pair of overalls they had a green monster with a big grin on the front pocket and the words 'Little monster' written in red. Underneath the overalls was a white onesie. The outfit came with a matching sun hat that was yellow and had "rawr" embroidered onto it. Anya grinned broadly. She could dress Sandra in a sack and she'd still look adorable. Sandras eyes fluttered sleepily open and she looked up at her mummy, confused she mentally corrected her thoughts. Carer. Not Mummy. She looked back up at Anya. Mummy. Sandra felt odd yet the connection felt right. Carer felt like someone impersonal doing a job, who would clock off at night and go home. Anya was so much more to her than that. Sandra, loved her. that conclusion hit her like a tonne of bricks. She rubbed at her eyes and her movement alerted Anya to the fact that she was awake. "Hi there Sandy, did you sleep good?" Anya cooed happily at her little one. Sandra just nodded, hesitantly and feeling foolish she opened her mouth "Ma...Ma?" for a second Anya looked shocked, then her shock expression melted into one of pure unconditional love. She lifted Sandra from her sleeping position so that her head was now resting on Anyas shoulder, Anyas long wavy brown hair flowed around Sandra and she giggled as it tickled her face. "oh Sandy. Yes. I can be your mummy if you would like. I would like that very much. You're such a lovely little girl, I'll take care of you forever" Sandra felt elated. The words had just felt right, and she felt her heart just overflowing with happiness and love, then all of a sudden those feelings became distorted and twisted she suddenly felt strange, the feeling was almost like being drunk, she felt disconnected with her body and light headed. But she had been able to communicate! At last, she smiled and the last thing she remembered was Anya suddenly looking very worried. She could hear Anya calling her, as if she was very far away. "Sandddddyyyy?" Then, Sandra passed out.
1551111111111111.title: part 2

15511111111111111.content:
"....Interesting, and you haven't noticed anything else strange?....I see..." Sandra woke to hear a man talking, his voice deep yet soft. She rubbed at her eyes. Where was she now? She looked around but couldn't see anything. She was completely covered in some white material, the material was thin and she could see daylight through it and grey shapes of objects beyond. It reminded her of times when she was a real kid and she would hide under her bed sheets during the summer. Under the covers used to be light enough to see. She looked down at herself, and noticed she was completely naked. "Hey, where are my clothes?" "Sounds like someone is finally awake" The man said. "Oh thank goodness." Sandra heard Anya, it sounded like she was upset. Why was her mummy upset. Sandra struggled against the material surrounding her. Why couldn't she get out? She wanted to see why mummy sounded sad. She suddenly felt motion and guessed someone had come to help her, and sure enough a few seconds later the material was stripped away. Sandra could now see she had been in some sling type contraption and had been hooked up to a set of weighing scales. She blinked at the sudden change in lighting and she didn't have time to focus before she was gathered up and hugged extra specially tight. "you little terror, you gave me such a fright!" Sandra didn't understand, what exactly was going on. She looked up at her mummy and saw that her face was blotchy, as if she had been crying. Sandra instinctively grabbed a fistful of Anyas hair. Sandra instantly felt better now that she was in Anyas arms. Anya smiled down at her and gave her a little reassuring squeeze. "She seems to be a healthy weight for her age, she seems bright and alert now, it might simply be the case that she's exhausted. As you well know its uncharacteristic for a Exchange subject to be aware this early on in the trip, it may had adverse side effects, the fact that we've started her so young means our normal rules and procedures may not apply quite so easily." Sandra looked over to the man, abruptly aware that she was completely naked in front of him she actually found herself wishing to have a nappy put on her at least to cover up a little. The man had almost raven black long hair,it had a bluish tinge to it and had silver at the temples, his hair had been tied back into a neat ponytail, he had stubble growing into a short goatee beard this too had flecks of silver. He was wearing a white doctors coat and had a pair of slim-line glasses perched on his nose. He noticed she was looking at him and his serious expression softened. He leant over and gently plucked her up from Anya and settled her on his own lap, she looked up at him, and noticed something odd, he had that same smell. The smell Anya had, the smell that made her think of safety and comfort. Suddenly she didn't mind being naked on this mans lap. He spoke, his voice full of regret "You know I haven't had time to really see you both." Anya nodded slowly. "Yes I know, but I know you've been really busy here. I was actually going to bring her over later this afternoon, but I guess I don't need to now. You'll be home later tonight though right" The man nodded. Sandra didn't understand what was going on, she looked between her mummy and this man, she looked back and forth between them and suddenly noticed the way they were looking at one another. The man took his glasses off and pinched the bridge of his nose, sighing. "If I had had any indication that she would be aware today I swear I would have taken the day off" Anya remained seated but leant across and placed a hand on his knee patting it reassuringly. "Its okay, I managed." She leant back and smiled. He returned the smile and then looked down at a rather confused looking Sandra, he lightly chuckled at her expression. "And you, young lady...." His sentence was cut off short when he suddenly jumped to his feet, holding Sandra out at arms length. His voice full of light amusement "I should have been more careful, I was asking for trouble wasn't I?" Anya was confused for a split second. "What's wron...Ah!" Anya started laughing, not her usual light chuckle but full on humoured laughing. It was obvious what was wrong cause it was still going on, Sandra had and was continuing to wet herself. Being held out at arms length she continued to dribble down her little chubby legs and onto the carpet below. She looked down at the puddle that was forming underneath her, and looked at the large wet patch she had made on the mans trousers. She hadn't even realised that she needed to go. It felt like the bottom of her heart had fallen out, she felt beyond distressed. She was disgusted by herself, and wanted to crawl into a hole and die, but the two adults in the room didn't seem to think it was disgusting, in fact Mummy laughing had infected the man too as he was now laughing as well. Sandras eyes were brimming full of tears but the fact that everyone seemed to be humoured by the situation stopped her from actually crying. Sandra had finally stopped relieving herself and the man moved to one side of the consultation room they were in and placed her on a table. Anya moved to his side, having gone into the changing bag she still carried and produced a clean disposable nappy. "Are you going to dress her?" Anya asked in disbelief. "Sure. how hard can it be, I mean i'm a qualified doctor of genetics, dressing a baby should be a breeze" the man shrugged the question off lightly as he took the disposable from Anya and lifted Sandras legs to place the disposable underneath. "You need to clean her up first" Anya quietly suggested. "yes, yes I knew that. I was just getting her ready." he said, trying to cover up his mistake. Meanwhile Sandra wasn't sure if she wanted to get off the table or whether she wanted to co-operate, currently she was naked, was being diapered worse or better? Considering the mess she had just made, perhaps it was for the best of all those concerned that she was thoroughly padded. If she had a choice she'd rather go in the confinements of a nappy than make a mess all over the floor again. She decided, even though she felt ashamed of herself, that she'd be better off wearing nappies, at least for the time being. The man had cleaned her up using a baby wipe and was struggling to fold the disposable round her waist properly. It wasn't helping that Sandra was squirming a little so every time he thought he had her in the right place she would move. Eventually he got her taped in, albeit slightly lopsidedly. Anya had just stood back and watched. A flicker of a smile on her face. The humour was still in her voice "not so easy huh Blake?" The man shook his head. "not so easy." he confirmed. Sandra looked up at the man as he grinned down at her. At least she knew his name now. It had been annoying that she had been naked in his company for quite some time and hadn't even known his name. He lifted Sandra back up to view his handy work. "You might as well put her clothes back on too, she's probably getting cold" Anya handed Blake her yellow denim monster outfit and onesie. Popping Sandra down onto her back Blake nodded, he'd done the tricky part surly this couldn't be any harder. 10 minutes later he was visibly sweating. "My god it's like putting an octopus into a string bag." He said as he tried for the third time to thread one of sandras flailing arms into the onesie. Sandra was getting visibly upset, she had decided to try and help Blake dress her to get it over with quicker but she seemed to be doing more harm than good. Her body didn't really want to cooperate and she found that helping was simply hindering the progress.

whilst being dressed, every other time she had woken up to find herself in a new outfit. Anya gently pushed Blake out of the way. She'd seen him suffer enough. "Here let me finish up here, why don't you go find yourself a dry pair of pants and some towels to mop up the mess on the floor you cant see any other patients today with that wet patch there." Blake admitted defeat, mumbled something under his breath and disappeared off. Anya worked quickly and efficiently, carefully guiding one arm, then the other through the onesie and doing the poppers up between the legs. Sandra didn't like the way the onesie pulled the nappy up tighter between her legs, it made it difficult to ignore that it was there. Gently Anya pulled the yellow overalls on and fastened the shoulder straps. Lastly pulling Sandra up into a sitting position she pulled on her booties just as Blake returned with some spray cleaner and sporting a new pair of pants, he'd taken off his white doctors jacket. Sandra thought he didn't look quite so intimidating with it off. He smiled when he saw that Sandra was fully dressed. "Clearly i'm no match for the pro here." he haphazardly sprayed the cleaner over the wet patch and threw a towel down on top of it. Anya watched him for a moment then gathered Sandra up in her arms. Sandra instinctively clung to her. "Well I guess we'll see you later then. I want to take Sandy back to the shopping plaza there's some stuff I need to get for dinner and I promised i'd take her some place special." Blake nodded but kept his focus on scrubbing the wet patch. "Okay, take her there but after that I would suggest going home. I'm unsure as to why she collapsed it could be nothing but then again we want to be careful, so don't over do it" Anyas lips fixed in a thin serious line. As she stuck Sandra's pacifier back into her mouth. "Ok i'll be careful. See you later" She walked over to him, bent down, kissed him on the cheek and then left him scrubbing Sandra's mess. Leaving the clinic she turned a few corners walked a few corridors and came to a lift, soon they were back at the shopping plaza.
15511111111111111.title: chapter 5

155111111111111111.content:
"Right where were we?" She said cheerfully to Sandra. Sandra had been carried in Anyas arms the whole way and she'd been thinking heavily about Blake. She didn't know peoples customs here but the way Anya and Blake interacted seemed to suggest they were a couple. Sandra wondered if that made Blake her paternal carer. It would explain why she recognised that familiar saftey smell from him, and how they would be seeing him later. Why hadn't Anya mentioned that Sandra had a father figure too? She felt anxious, having one person fuss over her was bad enough, but now it looked like she was part of a whole family unit. Were there brothers or sisters she hadn't found out about yet? "First off I need to get some groceries, we're running out of baby wipes and if that happens god help us all right" She grinned and ruffled Sandras hair. Sandra blushed "And I need some bits and pieces for dinner tonight." She was heading for a large shop that had people bustling in and out. It was obvious it was a supermarket. They walked in and Sandra looked around, it could easily have been just a normal Walmart store except the shelves were lined with really random things she had never seen before. The place looked neater than a normal Walmart though and Sandra couldn't quite place her finger on why that was. The odd thing was, everyones shopping baskets were empty. People were walking up to shelves picking items up putting them in the basket then taking them out and putting them back on the shelves. There was the occasional item staying in the basket but other than that everyone's baskets were empty. Sandras curiosity was piqued. She was interested to know what was going on here. Anya walked over to some shopping trolleys there were a couple of specially designed trolleys and Anya picked one of only 5 that had a child seat and threaded Sandra into it. She also placed the white changing bag in the trolley. Sandra looked down at her legs dangling as Anya pushed the trolley down the vegetable aisle. Like everyone else Anya picked things up, let them drop into the trolley and then retrieved the item and put it back. It seemed on closer inspection of the shelves that there was 5 of each item and that was it. Sandra grinned, that was why the place looked neater, there wasn't giant stacks of cans, just 5. 5 of everything. She surmised that if no-one was actually buying the stuff there was no reason to stock large quantities of goods. Sandra watched in fascination as Anya walked through the store repeating the strange process with even stranger items. Anya at one point looked down and saw the stern concentration on Sandras face. She laughed light-heartedly. "Are you watching what mummy is doing? Or are you filling your pants again?" Sandra averted her gaze feeling embarrassed for the umpteenth time today, she didnt think she was filling her pants as her mummy put it, but then she wasn't overly confident that she would be aware if she was or wasn't until either she felt wet or she smelt bad. Suddenly Sandra went cold. She hadn't thought about that. So far she had only wet herself, she was not looking forward to the prospect of it coming out the other end. Clearly a new level of humiliation was awaiting its chance to jump out and bite her. She clung onto the bar of the baby seat feeling dread in the pit of her stomach. She noticed on the bar on the right hand side was a strange indentation. She went to touch it. "ah ah ahh sweetie, no touch" Sandra looked at the button and went to touch it again and this time Anya's voice was more stern. "Sandra I said No!" Sandra decided it was probably best left alone, it was weird hearing her mummy call her by her full name, it sounded more authoritative. More like she shouldn't push her luck. She stared at the button and pouted. Soon they were in the baby section of the store. This part of the store was really quiet which was a stark contrast to the rest of the store. Anya picked up some baby wipes and some bottle steriliser a couple of cute new pacifiers with random animals printed on them, Sandra didnt recognise the animals, but she assumed they were animals because they had eyes.

and let out a little squeal. "Oh look how adorable this is" She plucked the outfit up off the shelf. Sandra recognised it as that wierd red pineapple fruit she had seen at the veg shop earlier. It even had a little hat with the leaves that jingled like wind chimes. Sandra was reminded of Halloween where parents would dress their babies up like pumpkins. She really didn't want to wear that. "You would just look too edible in this. It'll be perfect for the party next week." Sandra could see her mummy was just adoring the outfit, she resigned herself to the fact that she was going to end up looking like a red wind chime pineapple at some point in the not too distant future. Again the outfit went in the basket and then came right back out again Soon they approached the checkout the queues weren't too long, other people in their queue kept looking at Sandra and she felt self conscious. Every so often someone would comment on how cute she was or make some random babyish noise in her direction. Sandra wanted to sink into the seat and hide, but her mummy was loving it. Her chest puffed out proudly she was positively radiating happiness. Sandra enjoyed seeing her mummy this happy and she felt herself becoming slightly less shy as a result. Soon it was their turn at the cash till and Anya pressed the little button on the bar that Sandra had noticed earlier and a credit card popped out of a slot Sandra hadn't even seen. She handed the card to the cashier he swiped it handed it back and Anya placed it back in the slot. She then put her palm on a small flat screen and there was a short beep and a green light and the cashier simply bowed and said "thank you for your custom" With that Anya pushed the trolley out the other side of the checkout and the next person in the queue repeated the process. "right with that done we can go onto the fun stuff right kiddo!" Anya pushed the trolley back to the trolley bay, lifted Sandra out of the seat and walked off back into the main shopping precinct. Sandra really didn't understand what exactly had just happened. they didn't have any shopping, what exactly was going on. "wheres the food?" She asked confused forgetting that here, right now, she was simply talking baby babble. "wa sa wa, wa sa wa!, what ever are you trying to say. I wish I could understand you, it would make mummys life so much easier." Anya cooed at her baby. "yes it would, yes it would" She stopped momentarily to tickle sandra and Sandra burst into rapturous giggles, a few people that walked past smiled as they watched the public display of parental affection. Anya approached a shop and walked in. Sandra looked at all the colourful displays. Toys as far as she could see. Was this where her mummy was so keen to take her? She was 28, why would she love a toy store. The shop keeper came up to them, he had blonde hair short and messy, little grey eyes and was exceptionally thin, his face full of enthusiasm, a large grin plastered on his face "oh welcome, welcome" he rubbed his hands eagerly. sandra was reminded of the villain in pantomimes. "if you need anything don't hesitate to ask" With that he retreated back behind the safety of the cashier desk.
155111111111111111.title: part 2

1551111111111111111.content: Anya lowered Sandra to the floor, not completely though. She held onto Sandra's hands so Sandra's feet were on the floor but Anya was holding her up. "Come on Sandy, you've been such a good girl you deserve a treat. You can pick out a toy and I will buy it for you" Sandra toddled very unstably along the first row of toys. She didn't know what she was looking for and nothing really took her interest. To be honest she was concentrating more on staying upright than looking at what was on the shelves, although Sandra was under no pretence that the only reason she was staying on her feet was because her mummy was holding her up. She toddled down one aisle and then the next. The third aisle was the stuffed animal section and as Sandra walked down it she stopped. She had decided she didn't want a toy, she might look like an infant but she wasn't planning on acting like one any time soon, she wasn't a baby and playing with toys was just pointless, but that had been her conviction before she had seen 'It'. It looked like a stereotypical dragon. It had a happy face and was large and green. Its wings were yellow and it had a yellow belly. She didn't know why but she needed it. It seemed to be calling to her, maybe it was its happy face, maybe it was the bright colours. She had never needed anything more in her entire life, even back a couple of years ago when she had seen a new computer for a really good price she hadn't been 'THAT' impulsive. She headed for the toy and plucked it from the shelf giving it a squeeze. She hadn't realised that the tail had a jingly bell embedded into it, and t jingled as she hugged it. The yellow wings crinkled as she hugged it. She realised it was one of those sensory toys for really young children. She had picked something in her age bracket, she felt odd about that. How strange that she hadn't felt any inclination towards anything else in the store until she'd gotten into the preschool section. Anya was positively beaming at her daughters choice. "Do you like him sweetie? He's a very happy friend to have" Sandra clung to him as if her life depended on it. She felt strange for wanting a toy, she hadn't expected this sort of reaction from herself at all and it confused her somewhat. Absent mindedly she chewed on on of his ears. Anya plucked the toy from her grasp. "wait until mummy pays for it kiddo" She chuckled, but was instantly met with a loud wail. Sandra was crying, inconsolably crying. Sandra felt strange, her adult self was confused but the baby side was overpowering her, and it really really wanted that toy. She felt terrible having it taken off of her and she really needed it back. Anya quickly put the toy back in Sandra's grasp and almost instantly the crying subsided. "Okay Sandy, can you carry your new friend to the shop keeper?" Sandra nodded. Now she was a conundrum though as holding tight with one arm to her new toy she couldn't hold her mummys hands to stay upright. Anya realised the problem and scooped Sandra up into her arms and carried her to the checkout. The man there smiled at the mother and daughter and Anya waved her hand over the small palm sized grid and he went to take the dragon away from Sandra, but Anya stopped him. "no it's quite all right we'll take it now" Nodding he retreated his hands "okay thank you for your custom" he bowed as they left. Sandra hugged her new toy, she felt really happy. Happier than she had done since she was a real kid, the feeling of elation almost made up for the feeling of humiliation she had felt earlier. Currently she felt really lucky. She was warm dry well fed and well looked after, what more could she ask for. Anya could feel her baby squirming happily in her arms. Life was good, no life was better than she had ever dreamed possible. Together mother and child headed home.
1551111111111111111.title: part 3

15511111111111111111.content:
It wasn't long before Anya was walking down that first corridor. Sandra realised that it felt like an age ago since they had been last here. So much had happened in such a short space of time. Her whole new way of life was difficult to take in so quickly. The independent woman that she had been was apparently gone with no current known way of returning from her normal state. That in itself was hard to come to terms with. Quite frankly Sandra was surprised she hadn't gone into shock or was crying constantly. Perhaps the severity of her situation hadn't quite hit her yet, but she doubted that. The point where she had peed on Blake, if she hadn't gone into shock then, there was a strong possibility she wasn't going to go into shock at all. She looked at the dragon she still held tightly, feeling foolish, but equally happy Anya walked through a door that opened as they approached it, it whooshed closed and a light came on. They were in a different corridor but it was clear this was a home instead of one of the corridors they had previously been in, as pictures lined the walls and there was a pile of shoes just inside the door. Anya kicked off her shoes adding to the pile, humming happily and put the changing bag down beside the shoes Carrying Sandra through into the next room Sandra saw that it was a large lounge area. It was all in beige, a glass coffee table sat in the centre of the room, a large very comfy looking white sofa stretched down the length of one wall. There were a couple of shelving units with various trinkets dotted randomly on the shelves and some pictures of scenery on the walls. In one corner was a baby's playpen, there was also a baby walker propped up on its side against one wall. Anya carried on through the lounge and into the kitchen area. The kitchen had black work surfaces and red tiles on the walls, mingled with white. There was a cooker and a dining table, a baby high chair took head place at the table between two chairs. Sandra guessed that probably indicated that there wasn't any siblings she was expecting to pop out of the woodwork at any moment, although it also confirmed her suspicion that Blake lived here too. The kitchen looked like a normal kitchen, accept that there was a large pad on one of the work surfaces and she couldn't see any utensils laying out. The pad had multiple buttons and Anya walked over to the pad and pressed a couple of buttons then turned her back on the pad and threaded Sandra into the high chair, took the dragon off of her but put in on the table beside her so it was still in plain view, the dragon was smiling happily at her. Sandra was satisfied with that. "Stay here a moment sweetie" Sandra nodded, it wasn't like she could go anywhere else. Anya disappeared out of the room for a second. Sandra was left in the room with the strange pad making higher and higher pitched noises, it sounded like it was warming up. Anya returned moments later holding that strange cucumber kiwi fruit. "Here you can have some of this while mummy puts away the shopping." She peeled the fruit in front of Sandra, like a banana. Inside looked like cheese strings, orange in colour and rubbery looking. Anya carefully extracted a few of the strands and placed them on the high chairs feeding tray. Sandra looked at them doubtfully, and Anya laughed at her expression. "It's okay sweetie. Its tasty num nums." Anya popped one of the strings into her mouth and rubbed her tummy over dramatically. "mmmmmm, its good. Now Sandy try" With that Anya turned her attention back to the whirring kitchen pad. Sandra picked one of the thick strands up, it flopped around in her hand. She sniffed it but it didn't actually smell of anything in particular. Cautiously she put it in her mouth and bit down. "Whoa!" She broke into a giant grin. What a strange taste. It was sweet and refreshing, like a really juicy orange. in fact it tasted very much like an orange, with the exception of the curry taste. It had sharp spices in it that reminded Sandra of a Korma dish. The two flavours shouldn't be compatible but Sandra found herself drooling at the mix of sweet and bitter. She chewed, swallowed and crammed the second of the two strands into her mouth happily. "These are really good" She tried to say between her full mouth, suddenly some juice went down the wrong way and she splutter and coughed. Instantly Anya was by her side hauling her out of the seat and patting her on the back. Between the patting Anya was saying "Be careful sandy, you silly thing, you have to swallow your food before you try talking, perhaps I should have cut them into smaller chunks for you. I'll do that next time" Sandra suddenly realised something and as she continued to cough she spluttered. "Mummy you can understand me again now huh?" Anya nodded, feeling her heart swell on being called mummy properly for the first time, Sandra hadn't even noticed she'd said it. "Yes that's right, we're back in our quarters so we're able to communicate properly." Sandra had stopped coughing and Anya returned her to the high chair. "Can I have some more please?" Sandra asked hopefully. Anya broke another two strands off and pulled them apart with her hands into smaller more manageable chunks, placing them on the tray she smiled and said "That's your lot kiddo, I shouldn't even be feeding you this stuff, you're digestive system probably isn't ready for it" Sandra looked down at the pieces of fruit and then at her tummy. Instead of worrying though she plucked a piece of the fruit up and sucked on it happily.

air? That was impossible.
15511111111111111111.title: chapter 6

155111111111111111111.content: Anya simply gathered the packet up and stored it away in a cupboard. There was another low humm and a second packet appeared. Anya repeated the process of putting the product into a nearby cupboard. Sandra recognised the items from things that had been gathered and placed in the basket earlier. Suddenly her red pineapple outfit came into existance on the pad and Anya set it to one side, grinning broadly. "You really are going to look adorable in that. I can't wait" Sandra craned her neck round. Sadly the position of the high chair and the fact that Anya was stood directly in front of the machine meant she couldn't see quite what was going on. "What is that thing?" Sandra was thankful she was finally able to ask questions and get them answered. "This?" Anya asked pointing to the pad. "This is Buddy. When we go shopping we pick stuff up put it in the basket and mini-B...thats the card you saw popping out of the trolley, registers what you've selected. Then you buy it and they transport it here the next time you activate Buddy in your kitchen." Sandra cocked her head to one side, enthralled by the device. "Yeah but how EXACTLY does it work? I mean how did you pay at the shops? I saw no money." Anya walked over to the high chair and showed Sandra her hand. "You can't see it because its embedded into my hand but everyone on board has a chip implant. It knows how much currency a person has, what job they do, where they live. When you get scanned it simply deducts how much money you owe from your credit account. Sandras hands snaked out and using both of her small pudgy hands she grabbed onto her mummys large outstretched palm so she could inspect her palm closely. Anya let her daughter look at her palm for a few minutes, smiling as Sandras pudgy little fingers clung to her own adult fingers, then Anya gently pulled it away so she could continue to put away the groceries. Sandra looked at the outfit on the side. "what is that outfit? I saw some fruit earlier that looked like that." Anya nodded but didn't look round as she put something away in a refrigerator. "That is a Pymatri, its actually a vegetable. Sandra looked at it as she chewed carefully on a chunk of the strange fruit. "And what's this stuff i'm eating" She asked her mummy. Anya came back quickly, "That's Alumirp. Tasty isn't it. I knew you'd like it." Sandra nodded enthusiastically as she continued to chew and watch her mummy tidy away the groceries. She suddenly remembered the dog bird thing. "What was that dog bird thing? I liked him loads" Anya almost dropped the jar she was putting away she turned and looked at Sandra seriously, her eyes narrowing as she studied her baby swinging her legs happily in the high chair "How did you know it was a he?" She asked. "His voice sounded like a little boy" Sandra replied quietly, suddenly aware that the smile had gone from her mummys face. Anya crossed the room in two steps and pulled a chair out from the table and sat down. Taking Sandras hands in her own she looked direct into Sandras eyes. "Sandy, tell mummy. You understood the birdie didn't you." Sandra looked at her mummy, she was suddenly feeling afraid, the Alumirp on her feeding tray forgotten. What should she say? Should she lie, would she get in trouble if she lied and then it was found out later that she had fibbed, more importantly what would happen if she told the truth. Would lying achieve anything? Tears started to fill her eyes, she was confused as to why her mummy was bordering on looking angry. Slowly she gave the tiniest of nods. The serious expression on Anyas face turned to fear and she stood up and began pacing the room. Muttering to herself. "Keep calm, just think this through, it'll be alright." Sandra was afraid, her mummy was acting strange when Sandra spoke her voice quavered on the verge of crying. "I'm sorry, I didn't mean to do anyfing bad." Anya stopped pacing, lifted Sandra out of the high chair and gathered Sandra up into her arms. "Oh, sweetie, you've done nothing wrong." She said as she carried Sandra through to the lounge area, Sandra started to whimper as she realised they were leaving the dragon behind. Realising why her daughter was suddenly fussing, Anya retrieved the dragon from the table and handed it to her baby to hold. They returned to the lounge and Anya sat down on the sofa, settling Sandra down in her lap. Anya was still looking worried. "Listen Sandy, it's important you don't let anyone know that you can communicate with that Gliph. You're my baby and I am here to keep you safe. I don't want to scare you but its not normal for a child to be able to communicate with the animals here. I'm not sure how you've managed it and thats the problem. If others find out then..." Anya couldn't help it, she suddenly broke out into a sob and she hugged Sandra tightly. Sandra was afraid by her mummys reaction and she started crying too. Anya suddenly realised she was scaring her baby and quickly composed herself. Apologising profusely. "I'm sorry sweetie, I didn't mean to frighten you." Anya rubbed her tears away quickly. "I better explain something. Everyone here fits into a category, a job role, some are designed to be doctors or teachers or hunters or fishers. There's a coming of age ritual that happens when you go through puberty and your job role becomes obvious. You become naturally gifted in a specific area. The fact that you are able to communicate with that Gliph means you will be a Ranger. That's not a problem in itself, quite the opposite in fact as Rangers are actually fairly rare these days and its exciting that that's what you're going to be. But you're still an infant and you shouldn't be portraying Ranger abilities this young in your life. The other scientists in the facility, if they find out, will want to do tests, extensive tests....and....I'm..." Again, Anya lost the plot and began crying. Sandra looked up at her mummy and she clung on tight to the soft jumper she wore. "Mummy. MUMMY...Don' cry" Sandra tugged on the jumper. "Don' cry, I wont tell anywun, I wont. I pwomis" Sandras heart was pounding. Her voice had become overly childish, but again it hadn't really registered with her that she had developed a lisp in conjunction with her mummys agitated state. Earlier her mummy had told her she wasn't a lab rat, but Sandra wondered how true that actually was. It seemed so long as she was normal and didn't exhibit any strange behaviour she would be left alone, but if she started being different.... Sandra was a geneticist, one of the greatest the modern world had seen, this is what had gotten her into this mess in the first place. Her brilliant mind. Although not quite so brilliant now that she was a foot and a half tall, wet herself regularly and lived on a diet of breast milk. She knew that the curiosity of scientists could often get to such an overpowering extent that they would do anything for answers. Sandra didn't want to bring any more attention to herself than she already had. She could play dumb, she wasn't planning on being anyones lab experiment, well no more so, than she already was. Anya seemed to calm down a little at Sandras promise. She hugged her child tightly. "It'll be our secret kiddo okay. I don't even think you should tell your daddy about the Gliph" Sandra made a note of the dog bird thing being called a Gliph and it was odd but upon hearing the word she felt like she had already known it, like it had been on the tip of her tongue the entire time. She also realised that Anya's last sentence had finally confirmed that she had a daddy. It had to be Blake. She wondered if she would feel comfortable calling him daddy, and realised actually she had no problem with it at all, it felt more comfortable than calling him by his name. The mother and child hugged for a little while longer, just enjoying being in close proximity to one another then Anya caught sight of the time. "My goodness is it that late already? I better get dinner started." Her cheery disposition had returned, pushing aside her worries for now. There wasn't much point in fretting over something that hadn't happened yet, quickly she carried Sandra over to the playpen and popped her daughter down in it.
155111111111111111111.title: part 2

1551111111111111111111.content: "you play nice while mummy is busy. Be a good girl okay" Before Sandra could protest Anya disappeared into the kitchen. "No Wait?" Sandra called after her, but it was too late and suddenly Sandra was alone in the room. She looked at her dragon and stuck one of his ears into her mouth, chewing on the crinkly sounding fabric. She surveyed the rest of the pen. There were some stacking blocks and a couple of thick cardboard books. A large set of bright coloured plastic keys. Nothing overly exciting for anyone over the age of 12 months. Did mummy expect her to play with this stuff?. Anya appeared, leant over the pen and handed Sandra a bottle of liquid. "Have some juice okay. Sweetie." Sandra took the bottle with both hands, she let the dragon fall out of her mouth and stuck the bottle in her mouth without any qualms what so ever. She was actually really thirsty now it had been pointed out to her, and she guzzled a few mouthfuls. "Fankyooo" She said between the bottle nipple. Anya merely smiled and headed back into the kitchen. Sandra looked at the dragon. He really should have a name. She put the bottle down, it fell onto its side but it was drip proof so didn't leak. She then picked up the dragon again and looked at his smiley face grinning back at her. "i'm gonna be a ranger when I grow up." She said to him happily not actually knowing what a ranger was or did. "you can be my sidekick if you wanna" Suddenly she realised she was talking to a plushie and horrified at how stupid she felt she lobbed the toy across the pen. Instantly regretting her action she crawled over to it and picked the dragon back up. It felt as if more and more of her adult self was being swallowed up by the ever growing child side of her. Would she lose her mind? Was she destined to become a drooling unintelligible infant? She didn't believe that was exactly the case but she knew she was certainly changing. They took her for her mind so it didn't make sense to her to wipe that clean, but why was she happy to talk to a toy? She looked at her booties and suddenly felt the need to pull one of them off. She struggled with the first one for a moment then it popped off. She turned her attention to the other one and in her effort to pull it off she fell backwards onto her back. It came off too and she grinned at her achievement flipped over so she could crawl and slotted the two booties through the bars of the playpen. With that done she felt she could return to the task of naming her dragon. His main bulk was green and his name suddenly came to her. "You're Pea." She said happily to the dragon, for he was pea coloured. Pea simply smiled at her, she giggled lightly as she stuck his ear back in her mouth. She lay down on the floor of the playpen and in a matter of moment was sound asleep., a puddle of drool already forming. Anya came into the lounge once dinner was prepared and cooking. She saw her baby all bundled snuggly in the playpen sound asleep and Anyas heart simply melted. She retreated back to the kitchen and rummaged around a set of drawers finding a camera she came back to the lounge and took a couple of pictures. Their first baby pictues. She still couldnt believe she had been this lucky in sourcing a new child. Anya had so much love to give. Her heart melting at the sweetness of her baby in such a cute pose. It was past 7pm now and it was past Sandras bedtime although she didnt know that. Blake was home later than Anya had expected him. Just as she was thinking that, there was noise at the front door and Anya stepped into the hallway and greeted her partner with a kiss. He was already loosening his tie and grinned happily for the attention. "sorry i'm late, emergency, you know how it is" He kissed Anya full on the lips She smiled and led him into the living room, pointing at their sleeping child. "isn't she just perfect." Blake looked at the baby asleep in a strange position. "She is pretty cute. Has she been okay the rest of the day" Anya nodded happily. "I gave her some Alumirp you should have seen her face it was priceless" Blake chuckled imagining their baby's reaction then he shook his head chastising Anya. "You know you shouldn't be feeding her stuff like that yet." Anya nodded. "I know but still it was really funny. They stood there in the centre of the lounge for a while just staring at the slumbering Sandra, Blakes arms wrapped around Anyas waist lovingly. She then pulled away. "Dinner is probably ready" She led him into the Kitchen and he sat down at the table as she busied herself getting plates and utensils from drawers. She turned to him as she started pouring the soup she had made into bowls. "Can you get Sandy for me, while I finish up here." Nodding he got up from his seat and went back into the lounge. He gathered up Sandy as gently as he could. "Come on Sweetpea, Time for din-dins." Sandra woke up to find herself aloft in the arms of Daddy, already that overpowering smell of safety wafting over her. She smiled sleepily at him and clung onto his shirt. He smiled down at her and stroked her hair as he walked back to the kitchen and threaded her back into the high chair. She clearly wasn't awake as she kept nodding asleep then waking up abruptly, only to nod off again.
1551111111111111111111.title: part 3

15511111111111111111111.content: Blake watched her, chuckling every time her head bobbed close to the high chair feeding tray. "I think someone is a sleepy baby." Anya placed a bowl of soup down in front of Blake. "it's way past her bedtime, its almost 8pm. I think I should just feed her and put her to bed" Blake nodded. "Its probably for the best, she has had a pretty busy first day." Anya sat down at the table as Blake tucked into his soup. She reached over and pulled Sandra from the high chair, settling the baby onto her lap, unbuttoning her shirt and maternity bra and even in Sandras sleeping state the baby seemed to instinctively know what was going on and she latched on and begun to suckle. The family sat round the dining table in an amicable silence for a while as man and baby fed. Soon both were finished and Anya carried Sandra to her nursery and popped her gently down on the changing table. Stripping the baby naked Anya cleaned her up, put a thick terry nappy and plastic pants on her and then dressed her in a light pink footed sleeper suit with poppers around the crotch area for easy changes. Blake had entered the Nursery shortly afterwards holding Sandras dragon. "Cute toy, when did you get this?" "We got that today after leaving your surgery. she was so happy when she saw it." Carefully Blake walked to the crib and place the dragon at the head end. Smiling softly as he did so. As he retreated Anya walked up beside him and placed Sandra gently into the crib, half covering their daughter in her patchwork crib blanket. Both parents stopped, side by side and stared at the peacefully sleeping infant. Blake leant over and kissed Sandra on the forehead, Anya echoed the actions and together, silently they retreated from the room. Anya paused long enough to swicth on a plain round night light, and then closed the door. She wondered what tomorrow would bring, now that she finally had a proper family to take care of,

When Joe Fronier was born it took four storks to deliver him, the town said, and those storks were so tired they just dropped Joe off in the middle of their small mountain town. Well no one could figure who a baby as big as Joe belonged to, so most of the town chipped in and raised him together.


At 22 now, Joe was 10 feet tall. But his brain hadn't grown very big sadly. He got a job chopping wood but for the most part the town still took care of him. Any adult there He'd simply call Mommy and Daddy, it was easier to remeber. He also still had a habit of sucking his thumb, and still wore cloth diapers under his clothes.

Half the mornings, he'd come out of his special made cabin in nothing but a long night shirt and diaper, and would just go up to the nearest cow to drink instead of waiting for his bottle.
